Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By hemolytic assay , she exhibited 1 - 2 % of the normal serum C5 level and normal concentrations of other complement components .

Let's think step by step.

| hemolytic assay |

Note: I understand that the request is for "Disease" entities, but it seems there is a misunderstanding as "hemolytic assay" is not a disease. However, it is the method used to measure the level of a complement component (C5) in the serum, which can be indicative of certain diseases or medical conditions related to the immune system. I have included it as it might be the entity of interest in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".
